DOC.brief_summary: The potential health effect high intake lean fatty fish investigate overweight obese adult . Participants consume 750g/week fillet fish 8 week . Hypothesis : High intake fatty lean fish beneficially affect glucose regulation immune system .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Possible Health Effects Lean Fish Fatty Fish Intake Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥27 kg/m2 fast blood glucose ≤7.0 mmol/L pregnancy incompatibility fish consumption ( allergy , intolerance and/or dislike ) diagnose diabetes mellitus , heart disease gastrointestinal disease use medication affect lipid metabolism glucose homeostasis use antiinflammatory medication use supplement contain long chain n3 fatty acid intentional weight loss large fluctuation body weight ( > 3 kg ) previous two month
